game_description: Hop onto the battlefield in VR like never before. In large scale battles of up to 16 people, players can hitch a ride in multiple types of vehicles, land or air, to compete across intense game modes featuring exciting VR combat and chaotic gameplay. - Control a variety of vehicles such as jeeps, tanks, and helicopters - Huge battles of up to 16 players, with AI bots as well - Fight through multiple classic game modes like Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag.
review_1: Definitely worth your time since it is free!! The gamemodes are fantastic!!! Vehicles even better!! But the are 2 issues. Number 1 issue- getting into a game I wish we could get in at the beginning of the match instead we get put in the middle of the game. Number 2 issue- grabbing your gun out of your backpack is pretty annoying! But overall fantastic for free love the vehicles and please keep updating!!! P.S I will change review to 5 stars when bugs are fixed!!!
review_2: My left thumbstick is not working so I play on right thumbstick.
review_3: I'm excited to see where this ends up ultimately. Feels jenky but not awful
review_4: I like the game but Manet fix bugs and minor glitches but as long as they put hard work I think the game have great potential.
review_5: All I care About is that you can shoot people
